title: LFM for Dedicated Ranked 5's Team (Need Top,Mid, and Subs) Gold+
body:
Hi, we are in the midst of updating our Ranked 5's roster. As of now, we have played 9 games total, we won 7 and lost 2, placing us in Silver 2. We started off with a 5 man team, which crumbled to around 3-4 consistent players leaving 2 main roles open, along with subs. As of now, we are in need of a solid Top Laner, and a solid Mid Laner, as well as subs that can play 2 or more roles consistently. 

We understand that everyone isn't perfect and we're willing to help with that as you go along, but we do not want to teach you everything. You must have prior knowledge of your role, and be able to hold your own. We will be setting up scheduled practice times eventually during evenings, so if you can't be dedicated with those, then this team is not for you. We are looking to have fun, as well as grow as a team. So if you think you're up for that, please feel free to submit an application.

I have my own TeamSpeak server we can use, so we will be most likely communicating through that.


Do not add me in game, I will add you so we can setup a tryout time.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Team Name: Ryans Btches (Will probably make a different team later so we shouldn't worry too much about the name now)


Current Roster:
Top: None atm
Jungle: Leo Das Fuhrer(Silver 4)
Middle: LaVeya (Silver 4) - Also looking for another mid when she's not here
ADC:Roughs(Diamond 5)
Support: Mightyquiver (Platinum 2)

Subs: None atm

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What we are looking for:
1. Please be mechanically consistent.
2. Please be over 18.
3. Be able to play in the evenings (usually).
4. Have a solid champion pool.
5. Be cool, and not a weirdo.
6. Have decent knowledge of the game, and decent shot calling.
7. Have a mic and TeamSpeak
8. DO NOT RAGE.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Summoner Name:
Age:
Tier/Division:
Position:
Main Champion:
Secondary Champions:
What do you feel you bring to the team?
List off a known weakness you'd like to improve on:
Prior Team Experience:
Availability:
Mic/TeamSpeak?:

Please do not add me ingame, I will add you to schedule a tryout date and time.

replies.body:
Summoner Name: LostBast
Age: 21
Tier/Division: Gold 3
Position: Mid
Main Champion: Orianna ( i only play mages ;p)
Secondary Champions: Vel, Twisted fate, Lissandra, Annie, Azir, (talon)
What do you feel you bring to the team? I love playing the game and really want to take it to the next level. I'm a team-player and I can keep a cool head, I never surrender, nor do I cry!
I recently started streaming, it has more of an entertainment purpose though!
My one weakness: Maintaining high cs throughout the entire game (tends to fall off midgame), though I am actively working on improving it.
Prior Team Experience: (Lions of Tomorrow) we went in finals for a tournament.
Availability: Evenings!
Mic/TeamSpeak?: Of course!

Summoner Name: Arkmezyr Lindus
Age: 19
Tier/Division: Season 3 Plat 1, Currently practicing for S5 Placements
Position: Mid
Main Champion: Vlad
Secondary Champions: Orianna, Galio, Ahri, Swain, Karthus
What do you feel you bring to the team? Mostly a lane you can count on to perform consistently and not need jungle babysitting.
List off a known weakness you'd like to improve on: When to roam.
Prior Team Experience: Some season 2 teams here and there, nothing too serious, just gold stuff usually.
Availability: most nights, exceptions usually being tuesday, and friday. (I'm looking to sub by the way)
Mic/TeamSpeak?: Yes & Yes

Summoner Name: FreeNameChangeOP
Age: 23
Tier/Division: P4
Position: Mid
Main Champion: Ahri
Secondary Champions: Liss, Zed, Annie, Cass, Kass, LB, Diana
What do you feel you bring to the team? I generally have good pressure and do well or at least don't feed, ward a lot and work with the jungler to apply pressure
List off a known weakness you'd like to improve on: CSing on certain champions
Prior Team Experience: I was on a p3 team mostly as mid sometimes as the jungle, but we faced d1+ every night
Availability: Anytime atm
Mic/TeamSpeak?: Yes to both

Summoner Name: Kzalor
Age: 29
Tier/Division: G2
Position: Mid
Main Champion: Vel'Koz
Secondary Champions: Lissandra, Corki, Vladimir
What do you feel you bring to the team?: Positive attitude, safe play, decent game knowledge (team comps, etc), and a focus on objectives
List off a known weakness you'd like to improve on: I need to work on smart aggression as I tend to be a conservative player
Prior Team Experience: I have played on ranked teams for the past couple of seasons
Availability: Most weeknights and weekends
Mic: Yes (I prefer curse voice but I also have mumble and ts3)

Summoner Name: Best Quinn Ky
Age:23
Tier/Division: Gold5/4
Position: ADC/mid/support
Main Champion: Quinn
Secondary Champions: Blitz/ Sivir/ LB
What do you feel you bring to the team? Amazingly witty comments and stellar gameplay
List off a known weakness you'd like to improve on: Map Awareness
Prior Team Experience: Silver 1 3's  Team and up to Gold 3 in solo q
Availability: Most nights and sometime during afternoon
Mic: Yea, have most comms
